scenario_text.value:
Do you think our strategy for today will work
out okay?
Why would you ask that all of a sudden?

You were raring to go earlier, like, “On to
the final boss!” Stuff like that.

It’s not that I think our strategy won’t
work. It’s just...

It’s not the enemies that scare Miu. She’s
scared her brother might do something crazy.
Why’s that?

You know how he is, right? He doesn’t just
get into things. He really gets carried away.

Like, he said he was gonna run ahead to the
forest to warm-up...

I’m afraid when it comes right down to it,
he’ll mess things up.

This time it’s about whether or not Miu can
make it back to your world.

No wonder her brother’s more pumped up than
usual. Maybe TOO pumped up...

You should go remind him to keep his cool and
not get out of control.
Who, me?

(Kaito’s definitely liable to do something
wild if he thinks it’ll help Miu.)

(But I doubt it’ll change anything if I tell
him to calm down.)

(That’s still better than saying nothing
though, right...? Or is it?)
(How should I respond to Miu’s request? I will...)
Not talk to him.
Keep an eye on him.
Talk to him.
Not talk to him.
Uh, I don’t think that’s a good idea...
What?! Why not?

It might make him dig his heels in. Then
we’re even worse off.

He’s got his own stuff going on, so I’ll just
trust him and watch from afar.
Hm, you’re right that it could backfire...

But I still wish you’d have a quick word with
him.
Keep an eye on him.

I’ll keep an eye on him, but maybe it’s best
not to be too direct.
What? Why?! You should say it to his face!

Think about it. If you told him not to do
something, he’d get mad, right?
Well.... Yeah, maybe.

If he actually starts to do something crazy,
then I’ll definitely step in.
Okay. That might be our safest bet.
Talk to him.

Gotcha. I’ll try to have a talk with him at
some point.
Yay! I knew you’d do it, Takuma!

But I can’t make any promises. It’s all about
timing, after all.

I’m sure he has his own line of thinking
about what he’s doing.
Okay, that works for me.

I’m just relieved to know you’ll be keeping
an eye on him.

(I’m glad she trusts me, but I still feel
like I’m being pressured...)

Please make sure he doesn’t go out of control
or anything!
